chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Your inner garments are glued to your body by your cloak.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " clothing " and " pro ", the original meaning is underwear. "Yu Pian‧ Clothing Department": "Interlining, close-fitting clothes." Song Zhaoxi 𩇕 <Qiu Ruixiang>: "The distant mountains and clear autumn water, fragrant and warm the skirt lining the ground."

" Interlining " also means foil. Bei Zhou Yuxin's "Xinghua": "A nice treat for the guests, the gold plate is lined with Hongqiong." Song Zhang Lei "He Zhou Lianyan": "The sky does not move and the clouds hang at night, and the grasses begin to grow horseshoes."

" Lining " in modern Chinese also said to help, such as "Awaken the common saying ‧ Cairui Hong insults and revenge": "all the singles sidelines lining and said:?." Dear husband, how about it but we do not lie. ' "Dialects spoken today in the South The "help line" also comes from this meaning.
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " clothes " and " pro ", the original meaning is underwear.
humanum_full_description:
從「衣」，「親」聲，本義為內衣。《玉篇‧衣部》：「襯，近身衣。」宋趙希𩇕〈秋蕊香〉：「遠山碧淺秋水，香暖榴裙襯地。」

　　「襯」也表示襯托。北周庾信〈杏花〉：「好折待賓客，金盤襯紅瓊。」宋張耒〈和周廉彥〉：「天光不動晚雲垂，芳草初長襯馬蹄。」

　　「襯」在近現代漢語中還表示幫助，如《醒世恒言‧蔡瑞虹忍辱報仇》：「眾光棍從旁襯道：『相公，何如？可是我們不說謊麼。』」南方方言今口語中的「幫襯」，亦來自此義。

①近身衣，內衣：襯衫。襯褲。
②在裏面再託上一層：襯絨。襯砌。
③搭配上別的東西：襯托。陪襯。映襯。
④附在衣裳某一部分裏面的紡織品：領襯兒。袖襯兒。

Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 親 indicates the sound; 衤 (clothes) conveys the meaning.
HSK: 3
Chinese: The clothing that my relatives would send me as a birthday present would normally be warm inner garments for the winter time to go under my cloak.  
Meaning: inner garments
Hanzi: 衬
Story: Your inner garments are glued to your body by your cloak.
Kind: traditional
從「 衣 」，「 親 」聲，本義為內衣。《玉篇‧衣部》：「襯，近身衣。」宋趙希𩇕〈秋蕊香〉：「遠山碧淺秋水，香暖榴裙襯地。」 「 襯 」也表示襯托。北周庾信〈杏花〉：「好折待賓客，金盤襯紅瓊。」宋張耒〈和周廉彥〉：「天光不動晚雲垂，芳草初長襯馬蹄。」 「 襯 」在近現代漢語中還表示幫助，如《醒世恒言‧蔡瑞虹忍辱報仇》：「眾光棍從旁襯道：『相公，何如？可是我們不說謊麼。』」南方方言今口語中的「幫襯」，亦來自此義。
From the sound of " clothing" and " pro", the original meaning is underwear. "Yu Pian‧ Clothing Department": "Interlining, close-fitting clothes." Song Zhaoxi 𩇕 : "The distant mountains and clear autumn water, fragrant and warm the skirt lining the ground." " Interlining" also means foil. Bei Zhou Yuxin's "Xinghua": "A nice treat for the guests, the gold plate is lined with Hongqiong." Song Zhang Lei "He Zhou Lianyan": "The sky does not move and the clouds hang at night, and the grasses begin to grow horseshoes." " Lining" in modern Chinese also said to help, such as "Awaken the common saying ‧ Cairui Hong insults and revenge": "all the singles sidelines lining and said:?." Dear husband, how about it but we do not lie. ' "Dialects spoken today in the South The "help line" also comes from this meaning.

襯字的基本解释

襯
chèn
见“衬”。

襯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chèn］
［《廣韻》初觐切，去震，初。］
“衬1”的繁体字。
(1)外衣内的单衫，内衣。
(2)引申为贴身。
(3)谓穿在外衣里面。
(4)指附在衣服某一部分里面作为衬垫的东西。
(5)衬托；陪衬。
(6)相帮，帮助。
(7)衬垫；凑近。
(8)通“嚫”。布施。

襯字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【衣字部】　襯； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1127第01
【唐韻】【集韻】?初覲切，音櫬。近身衣也。【禮·雜記註】取名于襯，襯近尸也。　又施與亦曰襯。【齊諧記】蔣潛以通天犀纛上晉武陵王晞，晞甍，以襯衆僧。

襯字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
襯字的起名意思

暂无。

["Guangyun" at the beginning of the cut, to shake, at the beginning. ]
Traditional characters of "line 1".
(1) Single shirts and underwear inside outer garments.
(2) The extension is personal.
(3) Said to be worn inside the coat.
(4) Refers to something that is attached to a part of clothing as a cushion.
(5) Set off; set off.
(6) Help and help.
(7) Pad; get close.
(8) Through "嚫". Giving.
